对于极早产婴儿，黑人和西班牙裔婴儿较少发生护理讨论的重定向她们接受的护理水平是否取决于母亲的社会地位，这是最近发表在《美国医学会儿科杂志》在线版上的一项研究探讨的一个问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/For-infants-born-extremely-preterm-redirection-of-care-discussions-occurred-less-often-for-Black-and-Hispanic-infants。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/For-infants-born-extremely-preterm-redirection-of-care-discussions-occurred-less-often-for-Black-and-Hispanic-infants。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=138c6f10-b5ae-4caa-8d7a-71ce1926be0a Tue, 12 Mar 2024 11:10:00 -0400 For infants born extremely preterm, redirection of care discussions occurred less often for Black and Hispanic infants
研究揭示了 ARDS 患者肺部不稳定的机械解释明尼苏达大学双城分校的研究人员可能已经发现了急性呼吸窘迫综合征 (ARDS) 病例中肺部不稳定的机械解释，特别是在 COVID-19 或肺炎等呼吸道疾病后。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Research-uncovers-mechanical-explanation-for-instability-in-the-lungs-of-ARDS-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Research-uncovers-mechanical-explanation-for-instability-in-the-lungs-of-ARDS-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc972a60-dc7f-4bf8-898b-75c250f94490 Tue, 12 Mar 2024 10:39:21 -0400 Research uncovers mechanical explanation for instability in the lungs of ARDS patients
老化皮肤僵硬增加可能导致转移性皮肤癌发病率更高约翰·霍普金斯大学金梅尔癌症中心的研究人员进行的研究表明，与年龄相关的变化会导致皮肤变硬并变得缺乏弹性，这也可能导致老年人患转移性皮肤癌的几率更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Increased-stiffness-in-aging-skin-may-contribute-to-higher-rates-of-metastatic-skin-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240312/Increased-stiffness-in-aging-skin-may-contribute-to-higher-rates-of-metastatic-skin-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb39cc5b-1353-4bd3-a904-333abf052260 Tue, 12 Mar 2024 10:34:28 -0400 Increased stiffness in aging skin may contribute to higher rates of metastatic skin cancer
